text: gaman kirima sandaha bhauthika madhyayak awashya wanne pahatha kumana tharangawalata da?

rate sarwa aarthika mulyayan pirihi athi heyin shri lankawa thawaduratath nayadimata nusudusu ratak yayi jathyanthara pragdhana welendapola sithanne nam owun nayadima nathara karanu athi bawata maha banku adhipathiwaraya wisin karana lada prakashaya eeta hondama sakshiya yayi da punchi boralla nidahas madhya kendraye pawathi prawruththi sakachchawaka di manthriwaraya kiya.
eeka hariyata thaman pilibada rahasak thawa kenek danagaththa ha samanayi.
mema aushada thiyenne indiyawe himalaya kanduwati aashrithawayi.
(sayawani kotasa) jiwithaya wenas kala kathawak...

thakimak kaleth naha.
eheth me sambandhayen amarikawata erehi kisima handak nangi natha.
bonchi tikak kadala denna da?“
loke kohen gaththath ee udaharanaya ehemmama thamayi.
mathrukawa : “piya jathika suthraya ”
me kawi tika amaradewayanta upaharayakma wewa !

subha udasanak siyalu denatama
nilage duwa wada namayama pas wela thibuna.
api hamogema gaurawaya ethumata thiyenawa.
eya ese wuwahoth thamanata siduwanne sigiriyata yabada ratha galata samipawa idikota thibena kuda kutiyata wi hullannata pamanak bawa da ema piris kiyathi.
“padma” ganga diya prachanda wiya.
pasal sisunta laba dena nila andum wawchara kramaya nathara kara nawathath parani kramayata redi laba dimata thiranaya kara thibena bawa mudal ha aarthika katayuthu amathyanshaya sandahan karayi.
nekto thamayi mageth ganigeth eda meda thura priyathama kabanetad bima.
eeye galle pansalaka pawathi uthsawayakadi ohu pawasu de ada di ayiland mul puwathe dutuwemi.
matanam eeka hariyatama mathaka naha, eelangata ee gana liyanna adahasakuth thiyenawa, balamuko!

yuddhayath nathi samayath nathi ee dirgha aruma puduma kala parichchedaye aarambhakaya sema awasanaya da wuye kawanthissaya.
this wasaraka bedumwadi thrasthawadi yuddhaya nima kota 6 wasarak gewi yayi….
kota jiwithege satahana thamayi me thiyenne....
